title: Set working dir to Jtaccuino
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I would like to set the working directory of jtaccuino in order to be able to easily link files to be read from the notebook.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I want to know the current directory of jtaccuino when it is running.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**

**Additional context**
author: BrayanMnz

comments.body: You can use the magic variable `cwd` of type  `java.nio.file.Path` which gets injected into the notebook environment. This should be good enough for your usecase.
